title: Ticket #7564: condor_off and condor_restart usage with multiple startds
description:
LIGO is using multiple startds to put low-latency workflows into separate cgroups, until condor supports doing this in one cgroup. Trying to reconfig or restart daemons doesn't work, though: 

[root@node851 ~]# condor_config_val daemon_list
MASTER, STARTD, CKPT_SERVER GSTLAL_EARLY_STARTD

[root@node851 ~]# condor_reconfig -daemon STARTD
Sent "Reconfig" command to local startd

[root@node851 ~]# condor_reconfig -daemon GSTLAL_EARLY_STARTD
Can't find address for local GSTLAL_EARLY_STARTD
Perhaps you need to query another pool.


Note, condor_restart also fails, but condor_off and condor_on appear to work,

[root@node851 ~]# condor_restart -daemon GSTLAL_EARLY_STARTD
Can't find address for local GSTLAL_EARLY_STARTD
Perhaps you need to query another pool.

[root@node851 ~]# condor_off -daemon GSTLAL_EARLY_STARTD
Sent "Kill-Daemon" command for "GSTLAL_EARLY_STARTD" to local master

[root@node851 ~]# condor_on -daemon GSTLAL_EARLY_STARTD
Sent "Spawn-Daemon" command for "GSTLAL_EARLY_STARTD" to local master
remarks: Dropping to priority=4 since LIGO intends to move away from multiple startds -- so the priority of this issue is up to the Condor team if they care for other users.
creator: gthain
